update plugin_instances set host = #{host,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, container_name = #{containerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, port = #{port,jdbcType=INTEGER}, container_status = #{containerStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, package_id = #{packageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, docker_instance_resource_id = #{dockerInstanceResourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, instance_name = #{instanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, plugin_mysql_instance_resource_id = #{pluginMysqlInstanceResourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, s3bucket_resource_id = #{s3bucketResourceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from plugin_instances where package_id = #{pluginPackageId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and container_status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT i.id,i.package_id,i.instance_name,i.container_name,i.host,i.port,i.container_status, p.name AS package_name FROM plugin_instances i JOIN plugin_packages p ON i.package_id = p.id WHERE i.container_status = 'RUNNING'

select
from plugin_instances where container_status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and instance_name = #{instanceName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
